otherNames: Da Hu Fa, Da Hufa, Da Hufa Zhi Hei Huangsheng, 大护法
synopsis: A warrior named Da Hufa goes to save his prince from a dystopian village. He finds the dystopian village ruled by a fake God and his guards. In order to save the prince, Da hufa has to defeat the God and his men and discloses the whole conspiracy.
